name: Monster Dating Night
description:
A terrible fate awaits you.

You are trapped in the infamous Monster Mountain and have only a few minutes to escape before the creatures inside get hungry and eat you alive.

Because you can't fight, the only thing you can do to fend these beasts off is to try and win them over. After all: if they love you, they won't kill you.

You have a time-limit of 4 minutes in which you must traverse the mazey monster cave, meet the monsters in their respective areas and find out what they need for them to fall in love with you. It is your choice which monster you decide to swoon. If time runs out before you do this, it's game over.

Good luck.
